## Sum Digits

Let $S$ be the set of all 5 digit numbers created
using $1,2,3,4,5$ **without** repetition.

What is the sum of all numbers in $S$?

| In $S$  | Not in $S$ |
|---------|------------|
| $12345$ | $22133$    |
| $34152$ | $42053$    |
| $51243$ | $10043$    |
